global.trainText: Have you read about my latest travels? Read here!

homePage.title: Welcome to nesling.com!
homePage.aboutMe: My name is Matthias Gnilsen, and I am from Austria living now in Switzerland. I studied at ETH and have worked for various projects and companies. I love my job and I am eager to expand my knowledge in areas I haven't touched yet.

skills: Websiten written in JavaScript, TypeScript, React + Gatsby, Razor
Projects written in JavaScript: PDFMerger, Games
Drone Videos to Images in Python
Personal Apps written in Java, Kotlin, Flutter, MAUI/C#
Photogrammetry in C++ and its infrastructure in Python
D365 Connection and Manipulation with Python
Introduction to Machine Learning (ETHZ): Python Tasks
Design of Digital Circuits (ETHZ): FPGA board project, Book 1, Book 2

aboutCards.title: Who am I?
aboutCards.content: Born and raised in Vienna, I came to Zürich for my studies at ETH. Since then I stayed thereeee.

aboutCards.title: What do I do besides Programming?
aboutCards.content: What happened in 1291, or 44 BC? I love to read and explore historical topics. It amazes me when I think back, that people lived their normal lives, had their own problems, worries, joys. I also like to immerse in foreign cultures, including their languages: un po' italiano, un peu de français, Deutsch als meine Muttersprache, SCHINESISCH und surprisingly also English. Formula One too

aboutCards.title: How do I work?
aboutCards.content: I like to have a good understanding of the underlying basics, and also I am quick in adapting to new work environments (like this page). Structure, Structure, Structure and say no to spaghetti code, even if I like Italia! Needless to say, I also strive for a realistic approach. Sometimes it is wiser to do the more tedious method, sometimes it suffices to use a faster solution. WIP: maybe put somewhere else?

aboutCards.title: Where am I?
aboutCards.content: You can find me either in Switzerland or Austria. Or maybe somewhere else, usually in Europe, Spain, bella Italia, Deutschland or even a bit further away in Taiwan! See some of my travels here: My Travelling (WIP)

contactPage.title: How can we get in touch?

contactCard.title: Contact me via email!
contactCard.content: I will reply the next hours (seldomly it will take a few days) and we can arrange a (virtual, only accustic) meeting.
